metadata.title: Columbia womens Women's Whirlibird™ Ii Glove
features: OMNI-TECH: For prolonged exposure to moderate rain and snow. Multilayered waterproof protection in a breathable material that releases excess heat and moisture, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.

OMNI-HEAT: For versatile lightweight warmth in mild to severe cold. The interior lining consists of our Omni-Heat metallic dot pattern designed to retain heat, while the breathable fabric dissipates moisture.
85% RECYCLED INSULATION: You’ll feel better knowing these gloves incorporate warm Microtemp XF II insulation made from 85% recycled polyester.
MOUNTAIN READY: These touch-screen-compatible gloves feature a nose wipe on the thumb, weather-resistant goat leather palm, adjustable strap, and elastic at the wrist to seal out the cold.
FORM FITTING: Designed with our 3-point precurve cut that provides a natural fit with great dexterity for winter activities.
description: With a thermal-reflective lining, 85% recycled insulation, and a waterproof build, these gloves provide protection, warmth, and breathability for your cold-weather adventures. Plus, they have an intuitive fit and tech-friendly design. Columbia offers these gloves in multiple colors and sizes.
